name: Urban Shuffle
overview:
A multi-channel marketing company specializing in customer acquisition and retention using mobile to drive strategic brand and business objectives. Engage consumers with a broad array of mobile specific call to actions such as: NFC, QR Codes, short-urls, or mobile text keywords. We offer affordable turn-key mobile marketing campaigns driven by our cloud based mobile marketing platform to help businesses build qualified leads, boost brand awareness, increase sales funnel results, and build customer loyalty. We drive compelling emotional connections with consumers and brands using their mobile devices. Our philosophies on mobile marketing are revolutionizing the industry. We are the only mobile marketing platform leading the industry that provides app-less mobile campaigns built on a mobile framework not even close to HTML5. Our campaigns look and feel just like mobile apps.

Urban Shuffle is a team driven by a vision to allow every business the opportunity to engage in mobile strategy.
